name: Cup Rescue
description:
English

Cup Rescue is a platform game that takes place in Trobus, a parallel dimension to ours where the player has to save the whole world from the evil villain Master Eater.


Español

Cup Rescue es un juego de plataformas que se encuentra en Trobus, una dimension paralela a la nuestra donde el jugador tiene que salvar al mundo del malvado Master Eater.

If you have any suggestions, comments or feedback, you can leave a message down below or send me an email at cuprescue@gmail.com !

Cup Rescue Website
